# Results Directory

This directory stores outputs and visualizations from your analysis.

## Generated Files

You can save your analysis results here with descriptive filenames:

- Analysis outputs (CSV, JSON, etc.)
- Model performance metrics
- Comparison tables

## Plots and Figures

Visualization scripts may also save figures here:
- PNG or PDF format
- 300 DPI for publication quality

## Note

Result files are excluded from version control to keep the repository clean.
Use the utility functions in `utils/` to generate and save your analysis results.
